name: Soul Strike
base_effect: Burn enemy's soul, dealing 5698 Magic Damage over 2 seconds. Snares enemy by 50% while channeling.

name: Shatter Soul
base_effect: Burn enemy's soul, dealing 5698 Magic Damage over 2 seconds. Snares enemy by 50% while channeling. Deals 50% increased damage to enemies below 25% Health.

name: Soul Assault
base_effect: Burn enemy's soul, dealing 11396 Magic Damage over 4 seconds. Snares enemy by 50% while channeling. Increased channel duration and damage.

name: Soul Trap
base_effect: Lay a trap on enemy's soul for 10 seconds, dealing 3440 Magic Damage over the duration. Fills a soul gem if enemy dies while afflicted.

name: Soul Splitting Trap
base_effect: Lay a trap on enemy's soul for 10 seconds, dealing 3440 Magic Damage over the duration. Also affects one additional nearby enemy. Fills a soul gem if enemy dies while afflicted.

name: Consuming Trap
base_effect: Lay a trap on enemy's soul for 10 seconds, dealing 3440 Magic Damage over the duration. If enemy dies while afflicted, fills a soul gem and restores 3960 Health, Magicka, and Stamina.

name: Soul Summons
base_effect: Once every 2 hours, you can resurrect without using a Soul Gem.

name: Soul Shatter
base_effect: On death, explode in an area, dealing 1400 Magic Damage to nearby enemies. Soul Shatter ignores resurrection immunity.

name: Soul Lock
base_effect: Killing enemies with any ability has a 5% chance to automatically fill an empty soul gem.

name: Blood Scion
base_effect: Transform into a monstrous Blood Scion for 20 seconds. While transformed: gain 10000 Max Health, 30% healing received, and Vampire abilities do not cost Health. Also gain Night Vision and can see stealthed/invisible enemies. Dealing damage heals you for 15% of damage done.

name: Perfect Scion
base_effect: Transform into a monstrous Blood Scion for 20 seconds. While transformed: gain 10000 Max Health, 30% healing received, and Vampire abilities do not cost Health. Night Vision reveals stealthed/invisible enemies. Dealing damage heals you for 15% of damage done. While transformed, you cannot be stunned or feared.

name: Swarming Scion
base_effect: Transform into a monstrous Blood Scion for 20 seconds. While transformed: gain 10000 Max Health, 30% healing received, and Vampire abilities do not cost Health. Night Vision reveals stealthed/invisible enemies. Dealing damage heals you for 20% of damage done. Increased healing from damage.

name: Eviscerate
base_effect: Slash enemies in front of you with vampiric claws, dealing 2968 Physical Damage. Deals up to 50% more damage proportional to your missing Health.

name: Arterial Burst
base_effect: Slash enemies in front of you with vampiric claws, dealing 2968 Physical Damage. Deals up to 50% more damage proportional to your missing Health. Also heals you for 50% of damage dealt.

name: Ravenous Gouge
base_effect: Slash enemies in front of you with vampiric claws, dealing 2968 Physical Damage. Deals up to 50% more damage proportional to your missing Health. Enemies hit are afflicted with Minor Maim, reducing their damage by 5% for 10 seconds.

name: Blood Frenzy
base_effect: Toggle: Embrace your vampiric nature, draining 115 Health every second to grant 300 Weapon/Spell Damage. While active, you cannot regenerate Health.

name: Simmering Frenzy
base_effect: Toggle: Embrace your vampiric nature, draining 115 Health every second. Damage bonus increases over time, starting at 100 and building to 500 Weapon/Spell Damage. While active, you cannot regenerate Health.

name: Blood Frenzy (Stamina)
base_effect: Toggle: Embrace your vampiric nature, draining 115 Health every second to grant 300 Weapon/Spell Damage. While active, Health regeneration is disabled but Stamina Recovery is increased by 33%.

name: Vampiric Drain
base_effect: Drain an enemy's life force, dealing 2150 Magic Damage over 3 seconds and healing you for 100% of damage dealt. Also reduces Vampire Stage by 1 on completion.

name: Drain Vigor
base_effect: Drain an enemy's life force, dealing 2150 Magic Damage over 3 seconds and healing you for 100% of damage dealt. Also reduces Vampire Stage by 1 on completion. Restores 3960 Stamina on completion.

name: Exhilarating Drain
base_effect: Drain an enemy's life force, dealing 2150 Magic Damage over 3 seconds and healing you for 100% of damage dealt. Also reduces Vampire Stage by 1 on completion. Generates 6 Ultimate on completion.

name: Mesmerize
base_effect: Hypnotize up to 3 enemies in front of you, stunning them for 5 seconds. Enemies are released from the stun if they take damage.

name: Hypnosis
base_effect: Hypnotize up to 3 enemies in front of you, stunning them for 5 seconds. Enemies are released from the stun if they take damage. When stun ends, enemies are afflicted with Minor Cowardice, reducing their Weapon/Spell Damage by 215 for 4 seconds.

name: Stupefy
base_effect: Hypnotize up to 3 enemies in front of you, stunning them for 5 seconds. Enemies are released from the stun if they take damage. When stun ends, enemies are set Off Balance for 7 seconds.

name: Feed
base_effect: Feed on humanoid NPCs by holding interact. Feeding increases your Vampire Stage by 1 and grants you a Minor buff for 1 hour.

name: Dark Stalker
base_effect: Ignore the Movement Speed penalty of Sneak. At Vampire Stage 3+, you enter stealth 50% faster at night.

name: Strike from the Shadows
base_effect: After leaving Sneak, Invisibility, or Mist Form, gain 300 Weapon and Spell Damage for 6 seconds.

name: Undeath
base_effect: Gain up to 30% damage mitigation based on your missing Health. At Vampire Stage 4, this is increased to 60% at 100% missing Health.

name: Unnatural Movement
base_effect: After sprinting for 3 seconds, become invisible. Invisibility breaks upon entering combat or after 6 seconds.

name: Werewolf Transformation
base_effect: Transform into a fearsome Werewolf for 30 seconds. While transformed, your Max Stamina is increased by 10000, you gain 100% Stamina Recovery, and deal 18% more damage. Light and Heavy attacks restore 50 Stamina. Fear nearby enemies when you transform.

name: Pack Leader
base_effect: Transform into a fearsome Werewolf for 30 seconds. While transformed, your Max Stamina is increased by 10000, you gain 100% Stamina Recovery, and deal 18% more damage. Also summon two Direwolf companions to fight by your side. Grants allies in your group 10% Stamina Recovery.

name: Werewolf Berserker
base_effect: Transform into a fearsome Werewolf for 30 seconds. While transformed, your Max Stamina is increased by 10000, you gain 100% Stamina Recovery, and deal 18% more damage. Bleed enemies with Light Attacks, dealing 600 Bleed Damage over 4 seconds. Bleed can stack up to 5 times.

name: Pounce
base_effect: Leap at an enemy with primal fury, dealing 2968 Physical Damage. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Brutal Pounce
base_effect: Leap at an enemy with primal fury, dealing 2968 Physical Damage. Enemies near your target take 1484 Physical Damage. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Feral Pounce
base_effect: Leap at an enemy with primal fury, dealing 2968 Physical Damage. Extends Werewolf Timer by 5 seconds. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Hircine's Bounty
base_effect: Invoke the Huntsman's blessing, healing yourself for 10310 Health. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Hircine's Rage
base_effect: Invoke the Huntsman's blessing, healing yourself for 10310 Health. Also gain Major Berserk for 5 seconds, increasing damage by 10%. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Hircine's Fortitude
base_effect: Invoke the Huntsman's blessing, healing yourself for 10310 Health. Also restores 10310 Stamina. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Roar
base_effect: Let loose a terrifying roar, fearing up to 6 nearby enemies for 4 seconds. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Rousing Roar
base_effect: Let loose a terrifying roar, fearing up to 6 nearby enemies for 4 seconds. Allies gain Major Brutality, increasing Weapon Damage by 20% for 20 seconds. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Ferocious Roar
base_effect: Let loose a terrifying roar, fearing up to 6 nearby enemies for 4 seconds and setting them Off Balance. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Piercing Howl
base_effect: Crush enemy with a deafening howl, dealing 4524 Physical Damage. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Howl of Despair
base_effect: Crush enemy with a deafening howl, dealing 4524 Physical Damage. Creates a corpse on kill which can be used with Devour. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Howl of Agony
base_effect: Crush enemy with a deafening howl, dealing 4524 Physical Damage. Afflicts enemy with Major Fracture, reducing Physical Resistance by 5948 for 8 seconds. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Infectious Claws
base_effect: Shred enemies in front of you with rending claws, dealing 3010 Disease Damage over 10 seconds. Enemies hit are afflicted with Diseased, reducing their healing received by 8%. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Claws of Anguish
base_effect: Shred enemies in front of you with rending claws, dealing 3010 Disease Damage over 10 seconds. Enemies hit are afflicted with Diseased. Also applies Minor Maim, reducing their damage by 5% for 10 seconds. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Claws of Life
base_effect: Shred enemies in front of you with rending claws, dealing 3010 Disease Damage over 10 seconds. Enemies hit are afflicted with Diseased. Heal for 100% of the Disease Damage dealt. While in Werewolf form only.

name: Devour
base_effect: While in Werewolf form, you can devour corpses to restore Health and extend your Werewolf Timer by 4 seconds per corpse.

name: Pursuit
base_effect: Increases Stamina Recovery by 15% while in Werewolf form.

name: Blood Rage
base_effect: Taking damage extends the Werewolf Timer by 4 seconds. This can occur once every 5 seconds.

name: Bloodmoon
base_effect: Allows you to infect other players with Lycanthropy once per week by returning to the Werewolf ritual site.

name: Savage Strength
base_effect: Increases Weapon Damage by 9% while in Werewolf form.

name: Call of the Pack
base_effect: Reduces the cost of Werewolf Transformation by 10% for each transformed Werewolf in your group, up to 40%.

name: Improved Hiding
base_effect: Reduces the Stamina cost of Sneak by 10% per rank.

name: Light Fingers
base_effect: Increases your chance of successfully pickpocketing by 10% per rank.

name: Trafficker
base_effect: Increases the number of items you can fence and launder per day by 40 per rank.

name: Locksmith
base_effect: Improves your chances of forcing locks by 10% per rank.

name: Kickback
base_effect: Reduces bounty payments and fence prices by 10% per rank.

name: Excavator's Eye
base_effect: Highlights interactable objects during excavation, showing dig sites and bonus items.

name: Augur Assistance
base_effect: Uses the Augur to reveal a 3x3 area of the excavation grid, helping locate treasures.

name: Hand Brush
base_effect: Carefully brush away one layer of dirt from a single cell without damaging artifacts.

name: Heavy Shovel
base_effect: Removes all layers of dirt from a single cell but can damage artifacts. Best used on empty cells.

name: Trowel
base_effect: Removes one layer of dirt from a 2x2 area. Balanced tool for moderate excavation.

name: Keen Eye: Treasure Chests
base_effect: Treasure chests and heavy sacks have a chance to contain a random lead for an antiquity.

name: Antiquarian Insight
base_effect: Increases the amount of bonus loot retrieved from excavation sites.

name: Fortune's Favor
base_effect: Increases your chance to find bonus items when excavating antiquities.

name: Master Excavator
base_effect: Allows excavation of Ultimate difficulty antiquities and grants additional turns during excavation.

name: Professional Excavator
base_effect: Start excavations with your Augur charged, allowing immediate use without waiting.

name: Scry
base_effect: Use the Antiquarian's Eye to divine the location of an antiquity from its lead. Begins the scrying minigame.

name: Coalescence
base_effect: Select a facet on the scrying board to claim it and all connected facets of the same type.

name: Dilation
base_effect: Claim a facet and expand your current selection by one cell in all directions.

name: Farsight
base_effect: Select any unclaimed facet on the board regardless of distance from your current selection.

name: Scrying Focus
base_effect: Gain an additional attempt during scrying, allowing recovery from mistakes.

name: Antiquarian Knowledge
base_effect: Allows scrying of Simple (green) difficulty antiquity leads.

name: Intermediate Antiquarian
base_effect: Allows scrying of Intermediate (blue) difficulty antiquity leads.

name: Advanced Antiquarian
base_effect: Allows scrying of Advanced (purple) difficulty antiquity leads.

name: Master Antiquarian
base_effect: Allows scrying of Master (gold) difficulty antiquity leads.

name: Ultimate Antiquarian
base_effect: Allows scrying of Ultimate (orange) difficulty antiquity leads. Required for Mythic item leads.

name: Supernatural Recovery
base_effect: Increases Magicka and Stamina Recovery by 5%. At Vampire Stage 3 or higher, this bonus is increased to 10%.

name: Soul Siphon
base_effect: When you use a Soul Gem to resurrect yourself or an ally, you gain 10% of your Max Health, Magicka, and Stamina.
